## Container.set() method

Set a repository value

Signature:

```typescript
set(key: string, value: any): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |
| value     | any    |             |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
container.set("key", value);
```
